Z80 Links

The Zilog Z80 happens to be a fairly popular processor. Not only is it used in robotic projects, it is also used in the GameBoy, and the TRS-80. Here are some Z80 links for your viewing pleasure!

  • Zilog Z8-Z80 Support Page - Great Page!!!! GREAT Links in this site include:
    • Z80 Assembler syntax with detailed information This one is still under construction, and it is a really hard work, check it out
    • Z80 Assembler detailed information really good info here, also ASCII conversionn table, check it out
    • Z80 CPU Pictures See what we are talking about.
    • Z80 CPU pinout Main Processor
    • My Z80 FAQ, Frequently Asked Questions
    • Z80 Information Read about the R register, undoc + more
    • Z80 DRAM Refresh
    • Memory Banking Z80 Systems by Softaid
    • Z80 Undocumented Instructions
    • 8255 PIO Programming info
    • Known BUGS
    • Z80-inside by Mark Rison
    • Articles by Jack G. Ganssle Search and you will find Z80 stuff
    • OAKLAND Archive: Z280 Take your choice
    • Guide to Z80 I/O Programming !!!
  • How the Z80 differs from the 6502
  • Article Entitled "The Z80 Lives!"
  • A very comprehensive site about the technical aspects of the Gameboy, which uses a Z80 processor.
  • A picture of a gameboy robot made by Jack Davis
  • Another gameboy robot picture, made by Jeff Frohwein.
  • David Austens Z80 Homepage
